conversion_verification.notes: The conversion represents a geometrically faithful isometric cutaway of the provided architectural plan.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have clear height and thickness; floor planes are distinct. Isometric perspective is stable with high visibility.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Superior fidelity to the source plan. Room counts, adjacency, and relative wall lengths are highly accurate. Most openings align perfectly.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture sets (beds, sofa, dining table) are present in correct rooms at appropriate scales. Some bathroom fixtures are simplified.

visual_clarity.notes: Extremely clean render. Geometry is readable and lighting is neutral, ensuring no loss of detail. No text contamination.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of specific bathroom fixture geometries compared to technical icons in 2D.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D isometric conversion that maintains strict geometric fidelity to the source architectural floor plan.
